content.text:
# Republican Alliance for Democracy

The Republican Alliance for Democracy () () is an opposition political party in Djibouti, founded by Ahmed Dini Ahmed. In the parliamentary election held on 10 January 2003, the party was part of the Union for a Democratic Change (''Union pour l'Alternance DÃ©mocratique''), which won 37.3% of the popular vote but no seats in the National Assembly.

* [http://www.ard-djibouti.org Official website]
